body_html: IT would be better if you can avoid that dependency by just a few lines of code. Otherwise we would have to change setup instructions and everybody would have to go go through manual process of launching sdk manager and installing something. Or is it in some public maven repo? If so you can just add it as external dependency in BUILD file.

body: IT would be better if you can avoid that dependency by just a few lines of code. Otherwise we would have to change setup instructions and everybody would have to go go through manual process of launching sdk manager and installing something. Or is it in some public maven repo? If so you can just add it as external dependency in BUILD file.
